anursescalling.name: A Nurse's Calling
anursescalling.description: Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. The auras of injured Survivors who are healing or being healed are revealed to you when they are within a {0} meter range.

aceinthehole.name: Ace in the Hole
aceinthehole.description: Lady Luck always seems to be throwing something good your way.When retrieving an item from a chest, there is a 100% chance that a Visceral Rarity (or lower) add-on will be attached to it.{0}% chance of finding a second add-on of Uncommon rarity (or lower).When escaping, keep any add-ons your item has.

adrenaline.name: Adrenaline
adrenaline.description: You are fuelled by unexpected energy when on the verge of escape.This perk activates when the exit gates are powered.Instantly heal one health state if you are injured or in the dying state and gain 50% Haste for 3 seconds.Adrenaline ignores the Exhausted status effect. Causes the Exhausted status effect for {0} seconds.Haste increases Survivor movement speed.Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.

aftercare.name: Aftercare
aftercare.description: Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability.You see the aura of every Survivor that:You rescue from a hook, or rescues you from a hook;You complete a healing action on, or completes a healing action on you.They also see your aura.This occurs for up to {0} Survivors. All effects of Aftercare are reset when you are hooked by The Killer.

agitation.name: Agitation
agitation.description: You get excited in anticipation of hooking your prey.While transporting a body, your Terror Radius is increased by 12 meters and Increases your speed while transporting bodies by {0}%.

alert.name: Alert
alert.description: Your acute senses are on high alert.When the Killer performs a break action, the Killer is revealed to you for {0} seconds.

alieninstinct.name: Alien Instinct
alieninstinct.description: You are so stealthy, sometimes it seems like you appear out of nowhere.This perk activates when you hook a Survivor.You see the aura of the farthest injured Survivor for 8 seconds and that Survivor is Oblivious for {0} seconds.Oblivious prevents Survivors from hearing or being affected by the Killer's Terror Radius.“Yellow light's for my eyes only.” –Dallas

allshakingthunder.name: All-Shaking Thunder
allshakingthunder.description: Enemies on land and sea learned to tremble before your might.After you fall from a height, your lunge attack distance is increased by 75% for {0} seconds.This perk has a 5 second cooldown."Go on. Run. Tell your friends I'm coming for them." - Portia Maye

anymeansnecessary.name: Any Means Necessary
anymeansnecessary.description: You stand up for yourself, using whatever’s on hand to gain an advantage.You see the auras of dropped Pallets.Press and hold the Active Ability Button 1 for {0} seconds while standing beside a dropped pallet to reset it to its upright position.

apocalypticingenuity.name: Apocalyptic Ingenuity
apocalypticingenuity.description: You salvage what little there is to defend your team.After unlocking or rummaging through 2 chests, press Ability Button 1 for 4 seconds next to a broken pallet to build a fragile pallet.You see the auras of broken pallets within {0} meters.Fragile pallets are destroyed when dropped.“Without the fences, this place is worthless.” —Rick Grimes

appraisal.name: Appraisal
appraisal.description: You have a careful eye that notices what many overlook.Start the trial with 4 tokens. When a chest has already been opened, consume a token to rummage through it for an item. Rummaging can only be performed twice per chest.You rummage through chests {0}% faster.

autodidact.name: Autodidact
autodidact.description: You start the trial with a -15% progress penalty for Skill Checks to heal other Survivors.For every successful Skill Check while healing another Survivor, you receive a token up to a maximum of {0} tokens.Each token grants you a +15% progress bonus.Great Skill Checks cannot be performed while using Autodidact.Autodidact is not active when using a Med-kit to heal.

awakenedawareness.name: Awakened Awareness
awakenedawareness.description: Your genes have been altered to heighten your senses in intense situations.When carrying a Survivor, you can see the aura of other Survivors within {0} meters of your position.

babysitter.name: Babysitter
babysitter.description: While you have a reputation for being self-centered, you risk it all to help those in need.When you unhook a Survivor, they won’t leave scratch marks or pools of blood, and they gain a 10% Haste status effect for {0} seconds.You see the Killer's aura for 8 seconds.Haste increases Survivor movement speed.

backgroundplayer.name: Background Player
backgroundplayer.description: You're not usually the center of attention. In some cases, this can be a good thing.When the Killer picks up another Survivor, Background Player activates for {0} seconds.When you start running, you gain 50% Haste for 5 seconds.This perk cannot be used while Exhausted.This perk causes the Exhausted status effect for {0} seconds.Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.Haste increases Survivor movement speed.

badabadaboom.name: Bada Bada Boom
badabadaboom.description: You may not be a fighter, but you have clever ways of striking back.After completing 20% worth of repairs, press Ability button 1 next to a window to trap it for {0} seconds.The trap triggers when the Killer performs a vault on the window, inflicting them with -50% Hindered for 6 seconds.Hindered reduces Killer movement speed."Never tell me the odds." —Dustin Henderson

balancedlanding.name: Balanced Landing
balancedlanding.description: Your agility is incomparable.After falling from a height, cat-like reflexes reduce your stagger duration from falling by 75% and reduce the volume of grunts from falling by 100%. You gain 50% Haste for a maximum of 3 seconds.Causes the Exhausted status effect for {0} seconds.Balanced Landing cannot be used while Exhausted.Haste increases Survivor movement speed.Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.

bamboozle.name: Bamboozle
bamboozle.description: Your vault speed is {0}% faster.Performing a vault action calls upon The Entity to block that vault location to Survivors for {1} seconds.Only 1 vault location may be blocked in this way at any time.Does not affect pallets.

barbecuechili.name: Barbecue & Chili
barbecuechili.description: A deep bond with The Entity unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability.After hooking a Survivor, all other Survivors' auras are revealed to you for {0} seconds when they are further than 40 meters from the hook.

bardicinspiration.name: Bardic Inspiration
bardicinspiration.description:
It's time to give your audience a show. Will you bring the house down or will you choke?Press and hold the Ability button 1 while standing and motionless to enter the performance interaction that lasts up to 15 seconds and empowers Survivors within 16 meters. Roll a d20. This effect lasts for 90 seconds if the performance is completed .1 | You scream, but nothing happens
2-10 | Skill Checks give +1% progress
11-19 | Skill Checks give +2% progress
20 | Skill Checks give +3% progress When the ability is canceled or the performance completes, it goes on cooldown for {0} seconds."Listen closely! I'm about to save your life!" - Aestri

batteriesincluded.name: Batteries Included
batteriesincluded.description: Being somewhere between man and machine has its upsides.When within 16 meters of a completed generator, you have 5% Haste.The movement speed bonus lingers for {0} seconds after leaving the generator's range.Haste increases Killer movement speed.“Surprise! Did you miss me, Andy?” – Chucky

beastofprey.name: Beast of Prey
beastofprey.description: Your lust for a kill is so intense that your connection with The Entity is momentarily lost, making you totally unpredictable.When you gain Bloodlust, gain Undetectable for {0} seconds.Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

betterthannew.name: Better Than New
betterthannew.description: You are an expert in combat medicine. Patients leave your care reinvigorated.Upon completing a healing action on another Survivor, the targeted Survivor gets a {0}% speed boost to healing, opening chests, cleansing and blessing Totems.Survivors keep the bonus until they lose a health state.

bettertogether.name: Better Together
bettertogether.description: You seek justice and uncover the truth no matter what obstacle stands in your way.The aura of the generator you are currently repairing is revealed to all other Survivors.If The Killer downs a Survivor while you are repairing a generator, you see the aura of all other Survivors for {0} seconds.

bitethebullet.name: Bite the Bullet
bitethebullet.description: Pain hurts you as much as anyone, but you'd prefer others don't know that.When healing, you and the Survivor you're healing make no noise, including grunts of pain. There is no noise notification on failed healing Skill Checks and healing regresses by only {0}%.

bittermurmur.name: Bitter Murmur
bittermurmur.description: Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. Each time a generator is fully repaired, Survivors within {0} meters of the completed generator will be revealed for {1} seconds.When the last generator is fully repaired, all the Survivors' auras are revealed for {2} seconds.

blastmine.name: Blast Mine
blastmine.description: When direct combat isn't an option, you still find ways to strike back.Blast Mine activates after completing a total of {0}% worth of repair progress on generators.When standing next to a generator, press the Active Ability Button 2 to install a Blast Mine which stays active for {2} seconds.Affected generators will be revealed to all Survivors by a yellow aura. Only one Blast Mine can be active on a generator.When the Killer damages the generator, the Blast Mine explodes, stunning them and blinding anyone nearby.Blast Mine deactivates when the generator is damaged by the Killer or when the timer expires.

bloodecho.name: Blood Echo
bloodecho.description: The agony of one is inflicted on others.When hooking a Survivor, all injured Survivors suffer from the Hemorrhage and Exhausted status effects for {0} seconds.Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.Hemorrhage regresses healing progress when not healing, and increases blood trails left by injured Survivors. This lasts for a set duration or until healed.

bloodpact.name: Blood Pact
bloodpact.description: It’s as if a latent part of yourself has awakened. You feel like you can reach out beyond yourself for assistance.When you or the Obsession are injured, you both see each other's auras.After completing a healing action on the Obsession, or having the Obsession complete a healing action on you, you both gain a {1}% Haste status effect until no longer within 16 meters of each other.Reduces the odds of being the Obsession.If you are the Obsession, this perk deactivates.The Killer can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.Haste increases Survivor movement speed.

bloodrush.name: Blood Rush
bloodrush.description: Your mind and body are honed for great feats, allowing you to push through with extra effort when necessary.After being unhooked, Blood Rush activates for the next {0} seconds.While suffering from the Exhausted status effect, press the Active Ability Button 1 to recover from Exhausted instantly.This perk deactivates when it is used or when performing a Conspicuous Action.Blood Rush is disabled once the Exit Gates are powered.Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.

bloodwarden.name: Blood Warden
bloodwarden.description: As soon as an exit gate is opened, Blood Warden is activated. The auras of any Survivors located within Exit areas are revealed to you.Once per match, hooking a Survivor while Blood Warden is active calls upon The Entity to block both Exits for all Survivors for {0} seconds.

bloodhound.name: Bloodhound
bloodhound.description: Like a hunting scent hound, you smell traces of blood at a great distance.Fresh blood marks are considerably more discernible than normal and can be tracked for {0} seconds longer than normal.

boilover.name: Boil Over
boilover.description: You are a battler and do everything to escape a foe's grasp. Your struggling effects on The Killer are increased by {0}%.You obscure The Killer's ability to see hook auras within {1} meters.You gain {2}% of current wiggling progress when the Killer drops from great heights.

bond.name: Bond
bond.description: Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. Allies' auras are revealed to you when they are within a {0} meter range.

booncircleofhealing.name: Boon: Circle of Healing
booncircleofhealing.description: A boon that offers comfort amidst the terror.Press and hold the Ability button 1 near a Dull or Hex Totem to bless it and create a Boon Totem. Soft chimes ring out in a {0} meter range.Any Survivors within the Boon Totem's range gain a {1}% healing speed bonus to healing others. Med-kits give no bonus to healing in the Boon Totem's range. Injured Survivors have their auras revealed to all other Survivors when inside the Boon Totem’s range.You can only bless one Totem at a time. All equipped boon perks are active on your Boon Totem.

boondarktheory.name: Boon: Dark Theory
boondarktheory.description: Your obsessive study of the paranormal has given you unprecedented knowledge of other realms and planes of existence.Press and hold the Ability button near a Dull or Hex Totem to bless it and create a Boon Totem. Soft chimes ring out in a {0} meter range.Any Survivors within the Boon Totem’s range gain {1}% Haste. This effect lingers for {2} seconds after leaving the Boon Totem's range.You can only bless one Totem at a time. All equipped boon perks are active on your Boon Totem.Haste increases Survivor movement speed.

boonexponential.name: Boon: Exponential
boonexponential.description: When it seems like your number is up, you consider ways to recalculate the odds.Press and hold the Ability button near a Dull or Hex Totem to bless it and create a Boon Totem. Soft chimes ring out in a {0} meter range.All Survivors within the Boon Totem's range recover {1}% faster and can completely recover from the dying state.You can only bless one Totem at a time. All equipped boon perks are active on your Boon Totem.

boonillumination.name: Boon: Illumination
boonillumination.description: Your keen insight is something best shared with others.Press and hold the Ability Button 1 near a Dull or Hex Totem to bless it and create a Boon Totem. Soft chimes ring out in a {0} meter range.Survivors inside your Boon Totem’s range see the aura of all chests and all generators in blue.If you have a lit Boon Totem, you cleanse or bless Totems {1}% faster.You can only bless one Totem at a time. All equipped Boon perks are active on your Boon Totem."A shift in reality. Heavy with hidden meanings" – Return

boonshadowstep.name: Boon: Shadow Step
boonshadowstep.description: A boon that conceals the truth.Press and hold the Ability button near a Dull or Hex Totem to bless it and create a Boon Totem. Soft chimes ring out in a {0} meter range.Any Survivors within the Boon Totem’s range will have their scratch marks and auras hidden to the Killer. This effect lingers for {1} seconds after leaving the Boon Totem’s range.You can only bless one Totem at a time. All equipped boon perks are active on your Boon Totem.

borrowedtime.name: Borrowed Time
borrowedtime.description: You are fueled by unexpected energy when saving an ally from a hook.Survivors you unhook:Keep their Endurance status effect for an extra {0} seconds.Retain their Haste for an extra 10 seconds.Endurance prevents a Survivor from being downed, inflicting Deep Wound instead.Deep Wound will put a Survivor in the dying state unless it is mended before the timer runs out.Haste increases Survivor movement speed.

botanyknowledge.name: Botany Knowledge
botanyknowledge.description: You transform plants found around the campfire into tinctures that slow down bleeding.Healing speed is increased by {0}%.

breakdown.name: Breakdown
breakdown.description: Any time you are removed from a hook (escaped or saved), the hook breaks and the Killer's aura is shown to you for {0} seconds. A hook broken by this perk takes 180 seconds to respawn.

breakout.name: Breakout
breakout.description: You kick into high gear when someone’s in trouble, inspiring them to overcome any obstacle.When within {0} meters of a carried Survivor, you gain {1}% Haste status effect. The carried Survivor’s wiggle speed is increased by {2}%.Haste increases Survivor movement speed.

brutalstrength.name: Brutal Strength
brutalstrength.description: Your great strength allows you to shred through your prey's defenses.Destroy dropped pallets, breakable walls, and generators {0}% faster.

buckleup.name: Buckle Up
buckleup.description: Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. While healing a Survivor in the dying state:You both can see the Killer's aura.When completing healing a Survivor from the dying state to injured:The healed Survivor gains {0}% Haste for {1} seconds and leaves no scratch marks during this time.Haste increases Survivor movement speed.

builttolast.name: Built to Last
builttolast.description: You know how to get the most out of your tools.After hiding inside a locker for {0} seconds with a depleted item in hand, {1}% of its charges are refilled.Each use of Built to Last reduces the amounts of charges refilled by {2}%.

callofbrine.name: Call of Brine
callofbrine.description: Your psychic abilities influence technology in devastating ways.After damaging a generator this perk becomes active for {0} seconds.The generator regresses at {1}% of the normal regression speed and you can see its aura in yellow.Each time a Survivor completes a good Skill Check on a generator affected by this perk, you receive a loud noise notification.

calmspirit.name: Calm Spirit
calmspirit.description: Animals seem to trust you as they often stay calm in your presence.Reduces chances of alerting woodland creatures by 100%.Allows you to overcome the urge to scream.Allows you to open chests and cleanse/bless Totems silently, but at {0}% reduced speed.

camaraderie.name: Camaraderie
camaraderie.description: Life has taught you the importance of friendship which has given you strength.While you are on the hook in the struggle phase, Camaraderie activates.If another Survivor is within {0} meters of you while Camaraderie is activated, the hook timer is paused for {1} seconds.

championoflight.name: Champion of Light
championoflight.description: The glow of the flashlight looks a little different, feels a little warmer.When you are shining a Flashlight, you gain {0}% Haste.When you successfully blind the Killer, they also gain {1}% Hindered for {2} seconds.Then, this perk goes on cooldown for {3} seconds.Haste increases Survivor movement speed.Hindered reduces Killer movement speed.“I squeezed the flashlight like my life depended on it, willing it to stop coming any closer.” – Departure

changeofplan.name: Change of Plan
changeofplan.description: Rather than give in to danger, you recalculate and adjust your strategy.You start with {0} tokens.While inside a locker and holding a non-event Toolbox, press Ability button 2 to spend 1 token and transform your Toolbox into a Med-kit of the same rarity with a random add-on of the same rarity.The new Med-kit has {1}% of its charges.“Oh my god, oh my god, oh my god, oh my god.” —Dustin Henderson

chemicaltrap.name: Chemical Trap
chemicaltrap.description: In the Fog, an officer must adapt to the materials at hand.Chemical Trap activates after completing a total of {0}% worth of progress on generators.While standing next to a dropped pallet, press the Active Ability Button 2 to install a Trap, which stays active for {1} seconds.Affected pallets will be revealed to all Survivors by a yellow aura. Only one Chemical Trap can be active on a pallet.When the Killer performs the break action on the pallet, the Chemical Trap explodes, and they gain {2}% Hindered for {3} seconds.Hindered reduces Killer movement speed.“How do we kill it, Ash?” –Ellen Ripley

clairvoyance.name: Clairvoyance
clairvoyance.description: There is an intrinsic energy in you that sees beyond your vision.Clairvoyance activates whenever you cleanse or bless a Totem.When empty-handed, hold the Use Item Button to unlock your full aura-reading potential. For up to {0} seconds, you see the auras of exit gate switches, generators, hooks, chests and the Hatch within a {1} meter range.

cleanbreak.name: Clean Break
cleanbreak.description: At the end of the day, everyone has to look out for themselves.After you finish healing another Survivor, while being healed by another Survivor, press the Ability button 1 to gain the Broken status effect.After {0} seconds, you become healthy.This perk does not activate if you are already Broken. The effect is canceled if you go into the dying state.Broken prevents Survivors from being healed."I'll be fine! Don't stick your neck out for me." - Taurie Cain

comeandgetme.name: Come and Get Me!
comeandgetme.description: You’ll risk your life to save others.After unhooking a Survivor, while crouched and idle, press Ability button 1 to make injured and dying Survivors within {0} meters leave no scratch marks or pools of blood or make grunts of pain for {1} seconds.You scream and the Killer sees your aura for {2} seconds.“We're the ones who live.” —Rick Grimes

conviction.name: Conviction
conviction.description: Sometimes one last push means the difference between death and survival.After you have healed {0} other Survivor, while downed with at least {1}% recovery progress, press the Ability button 2 to recover instantly.You gain Broken, then are downed again after {2} seconds.Broken prevents Survivors from being healed."It's enough to keep going. Keep trying. Keep fighting. Keep dreaming." - Michonne Grimes

correctiveaction.name: Corrective Action
correctiveaction.description: You quickly analyze problems and correct other's work when they make a mistake.You start the trial with {0} token(s) and gain a token, up to a maximum of {1}, for every great Skill Check.When another Survivor fails a Normal Skill Check, 1 token is consumed and their failed Skill Check becomes a good Skill Check. Additionally, their aura is revealed to you for {2} seconds.

corruptintervention.name: Corrupt Intervention
corruptintervention.description: Your prayers invoke a dark power that meddles with the Survivors’s chances of survival.{0} generators located furthest from you are blocked by The Entity for {1} seconds at the start of the trial.Survivors cannot repair these generators for the duration. Affected generators are highlighted by a white aura.Corrupt Intervention deactivates when any Survivor enters the dying state.

coulrophobia.name: Coulrophobia
coulrophobia.description: Even those without a fear of clowns know to be terrified of you.Survivors within your Terror Radius have a {0}% penalty to healing progression speed, and healing Skill Checks move 50% faster.

counterforce.name: Counterforce
counterforce.description: You know how to withstand an enemy stronger than you, and it starts with hunting down and knocking out their support.You cleanse Totems 25% faster. After cleansing a Totem, you see the aura of the furthest Totem from you for {0} seconds and you gain an additional {1}% stackable speed bonus to cleansing Totems for the remainder of the trial.

coupdegrce.name: Coup de Grâce
coupdegrce.description: As the end nears, you go in for the kill.Each time a generator is completed, Coup de Grâce grows in power. Gain 2 tokens, with a maximum of 5 tokens.Consume one token to increase the distance of your next lunge attack by {0}%.

cruellimits.name: Cruel Limits
cruellimits.description: Your ties to the otherworldly manifest when your prey attempts to get away.Every time a generator is completed, all windows and vault locations are blocked for all Survivors for the next {0} seconds.You see the aura of the vault locations blocked by Cruel Limits for the duration.

cutloose.name: Cut Loose
cutloose.description: You get in enough trouble. You know how to get out of it.After performing a rushed vault in a chase, this perk activates.While this perk is active, your rushed vaults are silent for up to {0} seconds and successfully performing a rushed vault during that time resets the timer.This perk goes on cooldown for {1} seconds.

dancewithme.name: Dance With Me
dancewithme.description: When performing a rushed vault or leaving a locker in a sprint, you leave no scratch marks for {0} seconds.Dance With Me has a cooldown of {1} seconds.

darkarrogance.name: Dark Arrogance
darkarrogance.description: When everything is going right, you are an inescapable inevitability.Increases the duration you are blinded by any means and the duration of pallet stuns by {0}%.Increases regular vault speed by {1}%.“Run all you want. I will not be denied.” - Vecna

darkdevotion.name: Dark Devotion
darkdevotion.description: The display of your powers creates a whirlwind of panic that spreads throughout the land.You become obsessed with one Survivor. When the Obsession loses a health state, your Terror Radius transfers to the Obsession for {1} seconds, and its radius is set to {0} meters.You are granted the Undetectable status effect for the duration.The Survivor with the transferred Terror Radius is also considered to be "inside the Terror Radius" for other purposes.The Killer can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

darksense.name: Dark Sense
darksense.description: Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability.Each time a generator is completed, Dark Sense activates.While Dark Sense is active, the Killer entering a 24-meter radius around you reveals their aura for {0} seconds.Once the aura's duration expires, Dark Sense deactivates.

darknessrevealed.name: Darkness Revealed
darknessrevealed.description: In your presence, places once thought to be safe are perhaps the most dangerous.When you search a locker, the auras of all Survivors within {2} meters of any lockers are revealed to you for {0} seconds.Darkness Revealed has a cooldown of {1} seconds.

deadhard.name: Dead Hard
deadhard.description: You can take a beating.Dead hard activates after you are unhooked or unhook yourself.When injured, tap into your adrenaline bank to avoid incoming damage. Press the Active Ability Button 1 while running to gain the Endurance status effect for the next 0.5 seconds.Causes the Exhausted status effect for {0} seconds.Dead Hard then deactivates.Endurance prevents a Survivor from being downed, inflicting Deep Wound instead.Deep Wound will put a Survivor in the dying state unless it is mended before the timer runs out.Exhausted prevents survivors from activating exhausting perks.

deadmansswitch.name: Dead Man’s Switch
deadmansswitch.description: When you hook a Survivor, Dead Man’s Switch activates. The first Survivor that stops repairing a generator causes The Entity to block it for {0} seconds.The affected generator is highlighted by a white aura.Dead Man’s Switch cannot reactivate while it is blocking a generator.

deadline.name: Deadline
deadline.description: Desperation creeps in, and you push yourself to work harder.This perk activates when you are injured.Skill Checks appear {0}% more frequently when repairing or healing and appear in random places.The penalty for missing skill checks is reduced by {1}%.“The night had been one desperate situation after another.” – Departure

noholdsbarred.name: No Holds Barred
noholdsbarred.description: You induce mental suffering by crushing any hope of escape.After a generator is repaired, The Entity blocks the generator with the most progress for {0} seconds. You see its white aura during this time.

deathbound.name: Deathbound
deathbound.description: Those whose lives are intertwined in darkness are destined to suffer together.When a Survivor heals another Survivor, the healer Survivor screams and activates Deathbound. While they are at least {0} meters apart, the healer Survivor sees the aura of the Survivor they healed and suffers from the Oblivious status effect. Deathbound lasts until the healer loses a health state.Oblivious prevents Survivors from hearing or being affected by the Killer's Terror Radius.

deception.name: Deception
deception.description: Your adventurous lifestyle requires moments of crafty misdirection.Interacting with a locker while sprinting will trigger a loud noise notification at your location and cause you to leave no scratch marks for {0} seconds.You no longer enter lockers while sprinting and while this perk is active.Deception can only be triggered once every {1} seconds.

willtolive.name: Will to Live
willtolive.description: Stab at your aggressor in an attempt to escape.After being unhooked or unhooking yourself, Will to Live activates for {0} seconds.While active, complete a Skill Check when grabbed by the Killer to escape, stunning them for {1} seconds.Succeeding or failing the Skill Check disables Will to Live.You become the Obsession after stunning the Killer.The perk and its effects are disabled if the exit gates are powered.Increases your chance to be the Obsession.Taking any Conspicuous Action will deactivate Will to Live.The Killer can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

deerstalker.name: Deerstalker
deerstalker.description: While a Survivor sees your aura, you see their aura.Every {0} seconds, reveal your aura to the Survivor with the lowest chase time for {1} seconds.

dejavu.name: Deja Vu
dejavu.description: The auras of 3 generators which are in close proximity to one another are revealed to you.Gain a {0}% repair speed bonus on the revealed generators.

deliverance.name: Deliverance
deliverance.description: After performing a safe hook rescue on another Survivor, Deliverance activates.You now have a 100% chance of unhooking yourself during the escape attempt.A successful Deliverance from the hook triggers the Broken status effect for {0} seconds.Broken prevents Survivors from being healed.

desperatemeasures.name: Desperate Measures
desperatemeasures.description: You refuse to fail, even during your darkest hour.For each injured, hooked, or dying Survivor, increase the speed of your healing and unhook actions by {0}%.

detectiveshunch.name: Detective's Hunch
detectiveshunch.description: When a generator is completed, the auras of Generators, Chests and Totems within {0} meters are revealed to you for {1} seconds.

discordance.name: Discordance
discordance.description: Any generator within a range of {0} meters that is being repaired by two or more Survivors is marked by a yellow aura. When the generator is first highlighted, Discordance triggers a loud noise notification on the generator. After the generator is no longer within range or is no longer being repaired by two or more Survivors, the aura remains for another 4 seconds.

dissolution.name: Dissolution
dissolution.description: Everything turns to dust. It is as inescapable as the coming of the night.{1} seconds after injuring a Survivor by any means, Dissolution activates for {0} seconds. While Dissolution is active, if a Survivor fast vaults over a pallet inside of your Terror Radius, The Entity will break the pallet at the end of the vault, and Dissolution deactivates.

distortion.name: Distortion
distortion.description: When your aura would be shown to the Killer, the perk activates.Distortion starts with {0} token. When your aura would be read, Distortion activates and consumes a token. For the next {1} seconds, your aura and scratch marks will not be shown to The Killer. For each {2} seconds spent in chase, regain 1 token, up to {3}.This effect cannot trigger while in the dying state.

distressing.name: Distressing
distressing.description: Your horrifying emanation strikes at a supernaturally long distance.Your Terror Radius is increased by {0}%.

diversion.name: Diversion
diversion.description: Being within the Killer's Terror Radius while not in a chase for {0} seconds activates Diversion.Once Diversion is activated, press the Active Ability Button 1 while crouched and motionless to throw a pebble, which creates a distraction for The Killer at a distance of 20 meters.The perk timer resets once the ability has been activated.The distraction consists of:A loud noise notificationScratch marks

donoharm.name: Do No Harm
donoharm.description: Helping those in need comes easily, no matter how dire things get.When you heal another Survivor, for each Hook State they have, heal {0}% faster and gain {1}% progress for succeeding great Skill Checks."Look at me. My name's Orela, and I'm gonna make sure you're all right." - Orela Rose

dominance.name: Dominance
dominance.description: The power you wield over the land strikes terror in the hearts of all who cross your path.The first time each totem and each chest is interacted with by a Survivor, that totem or chest is blocked by the Entity for {0} seconds.The auras of blocked totems and chests are revealed to you in white."Tragic, is it not? How powerless you must feel." - Dracula

dragonsgrip.name: Dragon’s Grip
dragonsgrip.description: After damaging a generator, for the next {0} seconds, the first Survivor that interacts with it will scream, revealing their location for {1} seconds, and becoming afflicted with the Exposed status effect for {2} seconds.Dragon’s Grip has a cooldown of {3} seconds.Exposed Survivors will be downed by basic attacks even if uninjured.

dramaturgy.name: Dramaturgy
dramaturgy.description: When people bring you on to their project, they do so because of the unexpected magic you bring to your performance.Dramaturgy activates while you are healthy.While running, press the active ability button 2 to run with knees high for 0.5 seconds and then gain {0}% Haste for {1} seconds, followed by an unknown effect.Become Exposed for {2} seconds;Gain {3}% Haste for {4} seconds;Scream, but nothing happens;Gain a random rare item, with random add-ons, and drop any held item.The same effect cannot happen twice in a row.Dramaturgy causes Exhausted for {5} seconds. Can't be used while Exhausted.Exposed Survivors will be downed by basic attacks even if uninjured.Haste increases Survivor movement speed.Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating other perks that cause Exhausted.

dutyofcare.name: Duty of Care
dutyofcare.description: You live by a code of conduct every day of your life, and are all the better for it.When you take a protection hit while healthy, all other Survivors within {0} meters gain {1}% Haste for {2} seconds.Haste increases Survivor movement speed."Don't worry about me. I've got a knack for bouncing back."- Orela Rose

culltheweak.name: Cull the Weak
culltheweak.description: You become obsessed with one Survivor.Your Obsession gains a {0}% action speed bonus to unhooking and healing other Survivors.Each time you hook a Survivor other than the Obsession, if the Obsession is alive, gain a token.If the Obsession is alive, all Survivors who are not the Obsession get {1}% penalty to repair, healing and sabotage speeds for each token.The Killer can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

empathicconnection.name: Empathic Connection
empathicconnection.description: Your presence psychically projects itself to those in danger.Whenever another Survivor is injured, they can see your aura.You heal other Survivors {0}% fast

empathy.name: Empathy
empathy.description: Injured Survivors are revealed to you when within a {0} meter range.

enduring.name: Enduring
enduring.description: You are resilient to pain.You reduce the duration of pallet stuns by {0}%. Has no effect while carrying a Survivor.

eruption.name: Eruption
eruption.description: The NE-α parasite provides you with the intelligence and awareness needed to set a trap.After kicking a generator, its aura is highlighted in yellow.Whenever a Survivor enters the dying state, every affected generator explodes, losing {0}% worth of progress, and starts to regress.Any Survivor repairing a generator when it explodes will scream and reveal their aura for {1} seconds.Eruption has a cooldown of {2} seconds.

extrasensoryperception.name: Extrasensory Perception
extrasensoryperception.description: By slowing down and focusing, you can sense both ally and enemy.Crouch for {0} seconds to see the auras of Survivors, Killers, and a variety of objects. These are revealed in an expanding {1} meter radius.You gain Elusive and Oblivious.When you stop crouching, or after {2} seconds, all effects of this perk end and it enters a {3}-second cooldown.Elusive Survivors' auras cannot be seen, they leave no scratch marks, pools of blood or make grunts of pain.Oblivious prevents Survivors from hearing or being affected by the Killer's Terror Radius."What is friend?" —Eleven

exultation.name: Exultation
exultation.description: Fortune favors the bold, even in the darkest corners of existence.Stunning the Killer with a pallet upgrades your held item rarity to the next tier, then recharges {0}% of the item's maximum charges.This perk has a {1}-second cooldown."You will not take me this day!" - Trevor

eyesofbelmont.name: Eyes of Belmont
eyesofbelmont.description: A history of vampire-hunting imbues the bloodline with certain abilities.When a generator is completed, the aura of the Killer is revealed to you for {0} seconds.Whenever a Killer's aura is revealed for a specified amount of time, that time is increased by {1} seconds."Ha! Your secret has been revealed!" - Trevor

fasttrack.name: Fast Track
fasttrack.description: Sometimes the sacrifice of others is necessary to get ahead.Whenever another Survivor is hooked, you gain {0} tokens. You consume all tokens after a great Skill Check on a generator. Each token consumed grants a {1}% bonus progression for great Skill Checks when repairing generators.

finesse.name: Finesse
finesse.description: The threat of danger can motivate any creature to strengthen its resolve.This perk activates when you are healthy.Your fast vaults are {0}% faster.This perk goes on cooldown for {1} seconds after performing a fast vault."Just need to push myself a bit further." - Lara Croft

fireup.name: Fire Up
fireup.description: The increased pressure of losing your prey fills you with anger and gives you unsuspected motivation.Each time the Survivors complete repairs on a generator, Fire Up grows in power.For each generator completed, gain a {0}% stackable buff that grants a speed bonus to picking up, dropping, vaulting, damaging generators, and breaking pallets and breakable walls for the remainder of the trial.

fixated.name: Fixated
fixated.description: When you have a goal in mind, there’s no turning back: better to ask forgiveness than permission.You can see your own scratch marks at all times.While walking, you have {0}% Haste.Haste increases Survivor movement speed.

flashbang.name: Flashbang
flashbang.description: You've adapted to a world in chaos and making what you can from the debris.After completing {0}% progress on any generator, Flashbang activates.Enter a locker and press the Active Ability button 1 to craft a flash grenade.1 charge.Detonates with a loud bang and flashing light.Creates a noise notification.Can be used to distract or blind.You leave the flash grenade behind when escaping the trial.

flipflop.name: Flip-Flop
flipflop.description: You have an uncanny ability to escape the inevitable.While in dying state, {0}% of your recovery progression is converted into wiggle progression when you are picked up by The Killer, up to a maximum of {1}% total wiggle progression.

fogwise.name: Fogwise
fogwise.description: In your countless years in the fog, you've seen it all, and when you're focused, you can remember most of it, too.Hitting a great Skill Check while repairing a generator reveals the Killer's aura to you for {0} seconds.

forthepeople.name: For the People
forthepeople.description: You risk life and injury for others.For the People is only active while at full health.Press the Active Ability Button 1 while healing another Survivor without a Med-kit to instantly heal them from dying to injured, or from injured to healthy.You become injured and receive the Broken status effect for {0} seconds.You become the Obsession.Equipping this perk decreases your chances of being The Killer’s Obsession at the start of the trial.The Killer can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.Broken prevents Survivors from being healed.

forcedhesitation.name: Forced Hesitation
forcedhesitation.description: You have learned the emotional weaknesses of the organics, and how to exploit them.When a Survivor is put into the dying state by any means, all other Survivors standing within a {0} meter range around them suffer from the Hindered status effect for {1} seconds, reducing their movement speed by {2}%.This perk goes on cooldown for {3} seconds.Hindered reduces Survivor movement speed.

forcedpenance.name: Forced Penance
forcedpenance.description: Those who stand in the way of duty will suffer harsh judgment.Survivors who take a protection hit are inflicted with the Broken status effect for {0} seconds.Broken prevents Survivors from being healed.

foreverentwined.name: Forever Entwined
foreverentwined.description: The greater the struggle, the more difficult the escape.When a Survivor takes damage, gain 1 token, up to {0}.For each token, you pick up, drop and hook Survivors {1}% faster."You tried to devour me so you have no room to complain if I eat you, do you?" - Ken Kaneki

franklinsdemise.name: Franklin's Demise
franklinsdemise.description: Your basic attacks make Survivors drop their item on impact.Reveal items on the ground within {0} meters with a white aura.

friendlycompetition.name: Friendly Competition
friendlycompetition.description: You revel in the community spirit of a competition, and inspire others to follow suit.Whenever you finish repairing a generator with at least one other Survivor, this perk activates.You and other survivors who finished repairing the generator with you get {0}% increased repair progress speed for {1} seconds.Survivors can only have one instance of this perk's ability active at once.

friendstiltheend.name: Friends ‘Til the End
friendstiltheend.description: You’ll kill anyone who gets between you and your target.You become obsessed with one Survivor.When you hook a Survivor that is not the Obsession, the Obsession becomes Exposed for {0} seconds and reveals their aura for {1} seconds.When you hook the Obsession, another random Survivor screams and reveals their position and becomes the Obsession.The Killer can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.Exposed Survivors will be downed by basic attacks even if uninjured"I got some fresh meat lined up, and I'm not gonna let you spoil it, not this time!" – Chucky

furtivechase.name: Furtive Chase
furtivechase.description: You lurk in the shadows, eliminating your victims one by one.You become obsessed with one Survivor. When your Obsession is hooked, gain the Undetectable status effect and a {0}% Haste status effect for {1} seconds.When a Survivor rescues the Obsession from a hook, the rescuer becomes the Obsession.The Killer can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.Haste increases Killer movement speed.

gameafoot.name: Game Afoot
gameafoot.description: First you pick your prey. Then you pick it apart.While you are chasing the Obsession, this perk activates.Damaging generators and breaking walls or pallets gives you a {0}% Haste Status for {1} seconds.Whenever you hit the Survivor with the total most time in chase with a basic attack, they become the obsession.The Killer can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.Haste increases Killer movement speed.

gearhead.name: Gearhead
gearhead.description: You’ve got an ear for well-oiled gears.After a survivor loses a health state by any means, Gearhead activates for {0} seconds.While Gearhead is active, every time a Survivor performs a good Skill Check while repairing, their aura is revealed to you for {1} seconds.

geneticlimits.name: Genetic Limits
geneticlimits.description: Around you, the limits of human life become readily apparent.Anytime a Survivor loses a health state, they suffer from the Exhausted status effect for {0} seconds.Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.

ghostnotes.name: Ghost Notes
ghostnotes.description: You know that the best breakdowns precede the biggest build-ups.While you have Exhausted, your scratch marks disappear {0}% faster.You recover {1}% faster from Exhausted.Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating other perks that cause Exhausted.“Let’s take it to the bridge!” — Vee Boonyasak

grimembrace.name: Grim Embrace
grimembrace.description: Your act of servitude to The Entity has not gone unnoticed.Each time a Survivor is hooked for the first time, gain a token. When moving 16 meters away from the hook, all generators are blocked for {0} seconds.Upon reaching {1} tokens, when moving 16 meters away from the hook, The Entity instead blocks all generators for {2} seconds. The Obsession's aura is revealed to you for {3} seconds.Then, Grim Embrace deactivates.The Killer can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

hardened.name: Hardened
hardened.description: Live long enough, and survival will run in your blood.This perk activates after you complete all of the following:Unlock a chest;Cleanse or bless a totem.For the rest of the trial, anytime you would scream, reveal the Killer's aura for {0} seconds instead."Got to keep quiet. That thing is still out there." - Lara Croft

haywire.name: Haywire
haywire.description: For some reason, machinery has a habit of failing when you are near.Exit gate switches with at least 80% progress regress at a rate of {0}% of gate opening speed.While they are regressing, Survivors see the exit gate lights flicker randomly."There will be no redemption for you." - Springtrap

headon.name: Head On
headon.description: When your mind is set, there better be no one standing in your way.While standing in a locker, for {0} seconds, Head On activates.While Head On is activated, perform a rush action to leave a locker to use Head On. If The Killer is standing within Head On's effective range, The Killer is stunned for {1} seconds.Causes the Exhausted status effect for {2} seconds.Head On cannot be used while Exhausted.You do not recover from the Exhausted status effect while running.Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.

helpwanted.name: Help Wanted
helpwanted.description: Try as they might, you know how to stay one step ahead of your guests.When you damage a generator, it becomes Compromised. Only one generator can be Compromised at a time.When the Compromised generator is completed, your successful basic attack cooldowns are {0}% faster for {1} seconds."You only think you are in control..." - Springtrap

hexbloodfavor.name: Hex: Blood Favor
hexbloodfavor.description: A Hex that gains The Entity’s favor when blood is spilled.Injuring a Survivor will call upon The Entity to block pallets from being pulled down within a {0} meter radius of the Survivor location for {1} seconds.The Hex effects persist as long as the related Hex Totem is standing.

hexcrowdcontrol.name: Hex: Crowd Control
hexcrowdcontrol.description: A Hex that ensures those lesser than you are properly herded.When a Survivor performs a rushed vault, the vault becomes blocked by The Entity. This applies for up to {0} vaults.The Hex effects persist as long as the related Hex Totem is standing.

hexdevourhope.name: Hex: Devour Hope
hexdevourhope.description: A Hex rooting its power on hope. The false hope of Survivors ignites your hunger.When a Survivor is rescued from a hook at least 24 meters away, Devour Hope receives a token.2 Tokens: Gain a {0}% Haste status effect, 10 seconds after hooking a Survivor, for a duration of 10 seconds.3 Tokens: Survivors suffer from the Exposed status effect.5 Tokens: Grants the ability to kill Survivors by your own hand.The Hex effects persist as long as the related Hex Totem is standing.Exposed Survivors will be downed by basic attacks even if uninjured.Haste increases Killer movement speed.

hexfacethedarkness.name: Hex: Face the Darkness
hexfacethedarkness.description: You make an example of one of your victims, forcing their allies to become awed by your power.Injuring a Survivor by any means lights a Dull Totem, activating the Hex.While the Hex is active, all other Survivors outside of your Terror Radius will scream every {0} seconds, revealing their positions and auras for {1} seconds.When the Survivor enters the dying state or becomes healthy, the Hex totem becomes dull again and this perk deactivates.If the Hex totem is cleansed, this perk is permanently disabled.

hexhauntedground.name: Hex: Haunted Ground
hexhauntedground.description: Two trapped Hex Totems will spawn in the trial.When either one of the two trapped Hex Totems is cleansed by a Survivor, all Survivors suffer from the Exposed status effect for {0} seconds.The remaining trapped Hex Totem immediately becomes a Dull Totem.Exposed Survivors will be downed by basic attacks even if uninjured.

hexhivemind.name: Hex: Hive Mind
hexhivemind.description: You found yourself connected to something dark and unknowable… and you embraced it.The first time you hook any Survivor, a Dull Totem becomes a Hex Totem.Generators are highlighted; the intensity of the generator's auras reveals their repair progress.When {0} generator remains, all remaining generators explode, lose {1}% progress and start regressing, and the Hex Totem becomes dull.“You... let us in. And now, you are going to have to let us stay.” —Henry Creel

hexhuntresslullaby.name: Hex: Huntress Lullaby
hexhuntresslullaby.description: A Hex rooting its power in despair. Your hunt is an irresistible song of dread which muddles your prey's attention.Survivors receive a {0}% regression penalty when missing a Skill Check while healing or repairing.Each time a Survivor is hooked, Huntress Lullaby grows in power. It affects healing and repairing Skill Check warnings:1 to 4 Tokens: Time between the Skill Check warning sound and the Skill Check becomes shorter.5 Tokens: No Skill Check warning.The Hex effects persist as long as the related Hex Totem is standing.

hexnooneescapesdeath.name: Hex: No One Escapes Death
hexnooneescapesdeath.description: A Hex rooting its power on hope. You are animated by the power of your Hex Totem when the Survivors are on the verge of escaping.Once the exit gates are powered, if there is a Dull Totem remaining on the map, this Hex is applied to it.While this Hex is active,Survivors suffer from the Exposed status effect.You have {0}% Haste.Once the Hex's effect is revealed to the Survivors, its Hex Totem's aura is shown to the Survivors at a range of 4 meters. This range increases steadily over the next 30 seconds to 24 meters.The Hex effects persist as long as the related Hex Totem is standing.Exposed Survivors will be downed by basic attacks even if uninjured.Haste increases Killer movement speed.

hexnothingbutmisery.name: Hex: Nothing But Misery
hexnothingbutmisery.description: You've been driven to the absolute depths of pain, and now you're ready to inflict that pain on others.After you damage Survivors {0} times with basic attacks, a Dull Totem becomes a Hex Totem, cursing all Survivors.When you damage a Survivor with a basic attack, they gain {1}% Hindered for {2} seconds.The effects last until the Hex Totem is cleansed.Hindered reduces Survivor movement speed."All of the liabilities of this world are due to the inadequacies of the person involved." - Ken Kaneki

hexovertureofdoom.name: Hex: Overture of Doom
hexovertureofdoom.description: A hex that plays on the paranoia of others.Spawns a Hex Totem that curses the farthest generator and reveals its aura in yellow.When a Survivor repairs the cursed generator for {0} seconds, you gain Undetectable and your Terror Radius is applied to the generator for {1} seconds.When the cursed generator is repaired, the next farthest generator is cursed.Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.“From salvation’s ruin, be warned/death comes from all around.” —Giovanni Serrata’s “Fog Hill”

hexpentimento.name: Hex: Pentimento
hexpentimento.description: You see the aura of cleansed totems and can Rekindle each Totem once.While a Totem is Rekindled, Survivors Heal and Repair {0}% slower +{1}% for each additional Rekindled Totem.If all five totems are Rekindled simultaneously, all Totems are permanently blocked by The Entity.Survivors cursed by this perk see the auras of Rekindled Totems within {2} meters.

hexfortunesfool.name: Hex: Fortune's Fool
hexfortunesfool.description: A Hex that toys with a victim's suffering.The first time you hook a Survivor, they become Cursed and Hex: Fortune's Fool activates on a Dull Totem. The Cursed Survivor suffers from the Oblivious status effect until Hex: Fortune's Fool is cleansed.Hex: Fortune's Fool's totem aura is revealed to the Cursed Survivor when within {0} meters of it. For the first {1} seconds, only the Cursed Survivor can cleanse the totem.Oblivious prevents Survivors from hearing or being affected by the Killer's Terror Radius.

hexretribution.name: Hex: Retribution
hexretribution.description: A Hex that lashes out upon its destruction. Those who cross you will be punished.Any Survivor interacting with a Dull Totem or a Hex Totem will suffer from the Oblivious status effect for {0} seconds.If any Hex Totem is removed, including this one, the auras of all Survivors are revealed for {1} seconds.Oblivious prevents Survivors from hearing or being affected by the Killer's Terror Radius.

hexruin.name: Hex: Ruin
hexruin.description: A Hex that affects all Survivors' generator repair progress.All generators are affected by Hex: Ruin. While a generator is not being repaired by a Survivor, it will immediately and automatically regress repair progress at {0}% of the normal regression speed.The Hex effects persist as long as the related Hex Totem is standing.

hexthethirdseal.name: Hex: The Third Seal
hexthethirdseal.description: A Hex that hinders one's aura reading ability.Hitting a Survivor with a basic attack or a special attack while the Hex Totem is active applies the Blindness status effect. This effect applies to the last {0} Survivors hit.The Hex effects persist as long as the related Hex Totem is standing.Blindness prevents Survivors from seeing auras.

hexthrillofthehunt.name: Hex: Thrill of the Hunt
hexthrillofthehunt.description: A Hex rooting its power on hope. The false hope of Survivors fills you with excitement and strengthens your Totems.For each Dull and Hex Totem remaining on the map gain a token.Survivors' cleansing and blessing speed is reduced by {0}% for each token.The Hex effects persist as long as the related Hex Totem is standing.

hextwocanplay.name: Hex: Two Can Play
hextwocanplay.description: A Hex that teaches those who mess with you a lesson.Anytime you are stunned or blinded by any Survivor {0} times, if there is no Hex Totem associated with Hex: Two Can Play, a Dull Totem becomes a Hex Totem.Survivors who stun or blind you are blinded for {1} seconds. This does not affect carried Survivors.The Hex effects persist as long as the related Hex Totem is standing.“From now on, no more Mr. Good Guy.” – Chucky

hexundying.name: Hex: Undying
hexundying.description: While Hex: Undying is active, Survivors within {0} meters of any Dull Totem have their aura revealed.When another Hex Totem would be cleansed, that Totem's Hex transfers to the Hex: Undying Totem, deactivating Hex: Undying. Any tokens the transferred Hex had are transferred as well.

hexwretchedfate.name: Hex: Wretched Fate
hexwretchedfate.description: You see your victim from afar and resolve to prolong their suffering.After one generator has been repaired, a random Dull Totem becomes a Hex Totem and curses the Obsession.The Obsession suffers a {0}% repair speed penalty. They also see this Hex Totem's aura when within {1} meters.This effect persists until the Hex Totem is cleansed.The Killer can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time."So toil, mortal, toil! Your effort will be for naught!" - Dracula

hoarder.name: Hoarder
hoarder.description: You protect what little you have and are attentive to any disturbance of your stockpiles.Survivors reveal their location when they interact with a chest or when they pick up an item within {0} meters of your location.The trial begins with up to {1} additional Chests in the environment.

hope.name: Hope
hope.description: The growing odds of a successful escape fill you with hope and give you wings.As soon as the exit gates are powered you gain a {0}% Haste status effect.Haste increases Survivor movement speed.

hubris.name: Hubris
hubris.description: You show no mercy, especially to those foolish enough to resist.Whenever you are stunned by a Survivor, that Survivor suffers from the Exposed status effect for {0} seconds.Hubris has a cooldown of {1} seconds.Exposed Survivors will be downed by basic attacks even if uninjured.

humangreed.name: Human Greed
humangreed.description: One can always rely on the avarice of the living and use it to one's advantage.You see the auras of Unopened chests and Survivors' auras are revealed for {0} seconds when they enter a {1}-meter range.You also gain the ability to kick chests to close them. This ability has a {2}-second cooldown."Come running, one and all, and see what fortune awaits you."- Dracula

hyperfocus.name: Hyperfocus
hyperfocus.description: You throw yourself entirely into your tasks and find ways to be more efficient than anyone else.After hitting a great Skill Check while repairing or healing, this perk gains {1} token, up to {2} tokens. Each token increases the chance of Skill Check trigger by {3}%, the Skill Check cursor speed by {4}% and the bonus progression for great Skill Checks by {0}% of its base value.The perk loses all tokens in case of normal Skill Check successes, Skill Check fails, or if the action is stopped by any means.

hysteria.name: Hysteria
hysteria.description: You know how to brutalize one member of a team to cause a panic.Whenever a healthy Survivor becomes injured by any means, all injured Survivors suffer from the Oblivious status effect for {0} seconds.Hysteria can only trigger once every {1} seconds.Oblivious prevents Survivors from hearing or being affected by the Killer's Terror Radius.

imallears.name: I'm All Ears
imallears.description: Your keen senses are sharpened in the dark realm of The Entity.Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. Any Survivor performing a rushed action within 48 meters from your location will have their aura revealed for {0} seconds.I'm All Ears can only be triggered once every {1} seconds.

infectiousfright.name: Infectious Fright
infectiousfright.description: The cries of the unfaithful make your heart leap.Any Survivors that are within your Terror Radius while another Survivor is put into the dying state will scream and reveal their location to you for {0} seconds.

innerfocus.name: Inner Focus
innerfocus.description: You have honed your ability to see through the haze of the Ravage.You can see other Survivors' scratch marks.When the Killer causes another Survivor to lose a health state, the Killer's aura is revealed to you for {0} seconds.

innerstrength.name: Inner Strength
innerstrength.description: You look inward and trust your instincts when you feel lost and alone.Each time you complete a Totem cleanse action, Inner Strength activates. If you are already afflicted by the Broken status effect, Inner Strength does not activate.While Inner Strength is active, hiding inside a locker for {0} seconds while injured automatically heals you from injured to healthy.Inner Strength becomes deactivated as soon as it has successfully triggered.

insidious.name: Insidious
insidious.description: Unlocks the stealth ability.Standing still for {0} seconds grants you the Undetectable status effect until you move or act again.Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

invocationtreacherouscrows.name: Invocation: Treacherous Crows
invocationtreacherouscrows.description: One with arcane knowledge has no reason to fear those watchful birds.When in the basement near the circle, press the Ability button 2 to begin the Invocation.Invocations take {0} seconds. Other Survivors will see your aura during this and can join an ongoing interaction.Once the Invocation is completed:You become injured and gain the Broken status effect for the rest of the trial.When a Survivor is in the Terror Radius and the Killer scares a crow, their aura is revealed to all Survivors for {1} seconds.Completing the Invocation disables that perk for all Survivors.Broken prevents Survivors from being healed."Remember your training. They taught you all about the crows." - Taurie Cain

invocationweavingspiders.name: Invocation: Weaving Spiders
invocationweavingspiders.description: The place where fear festers and terror treads is also where those with the gift can reach across the veil.When in the basement near the circle, press the Ability Button 1 to begin the Invocation.Invocations take {0} seconds. Other Survivors will see your aura during this and can join an ongoing interaction.Once the Invocation is completed:You become Injured and gain the Broken status effect for the rest of the trial.Reduce the maximum required generator charges of all remaining generators by {1}.Completing the Invocation disables that perk for all Survivors.Broken prevents Survivors from being healed."I call upon the spirits of the night, to aid us in our desperate flight!" - Sable

irongrasp.name: Iron Grasp
irongrasp.description: Your powerful hold on the Survivors causes escapes to be nearly impossible.Effects of Survivor struggling are reduced by {0}%. Time to struggle out of your grasp is increased by {1}%.

ironmaiden.name: Iron Maiden
ironmaiden.description: You open lockers {0}% faster.Survivors who exit lockers suffer from the Exposed status effect for {2} seconds and scream, revealing their location for {1} seconds.Exposed Survivors will be downed by basic attacks even if uninjured.

ironwill.name: Iron Will
ironwill.description: You're able to concentrate and enter a meditative-like state to numb some pain. Grunts of pain caused by injuries are reduced by {0}%. Does not function while Exhausted. Does not inflict Exhausted.Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.

kindred.name: Kindred
kindred.description: Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. While you are on the hook, all Survivor's auras are revealed to all other Survivors. If The Killer is within a {0} meter range, The Killer's aura is revealed to you and all other Survivors.While a Survivor other than you is on the hook, all other Survivors’ auras are revealed to you. If The Killer is within a {0} meter range of the hooked Survivor, The Killer's aura is revealed to you.

knockout.name: Knock Out
knockout.description: The trauma caused by your brutal attacks makes crying for help painfully difficult.When a Survivor drops a pallet, if they move {0} meters away from it within {1} seconds, they gain {2}% Hindered for {3} seconds.Hindered reduces Survivor movement speed.

languidtouch.name: Languid Touch
languidtouch.description: Your dreadful aura is so suffocating that even terrifying scenes tire your prey.When a Survivor within {0} meters of you scares a crow, they suffer from the Exhausted status effect for {1} seconds.Languid Touch has a cooldown of {2} seconds.Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.“Submit to me. It is inevitable.” - Vecna

laststand.name: Last Stand
laststand.description: Even when things are at their worst, your spirit is indomitable.After spending {0} seconds in the Killer's Terror Radius while not in chase, when you fast-vault, stun the Killer for {1} seconds if they are within {2} meters.Then, this perk is disabled for the rest of the trial."Some bullies, you can live with. Others, you gotta fight."- Michonne Grimes

leader.name: Leader
leader.description: You're able to organize a team to cooperate more efficiently.Increases other Survivors' healing, sabotage, unhooking, cleansing, opening exit gates, and chest unlocking speeds by {0}% when they are within a {1} meter range from you.Survivors can only be affected by one Leader effect at a time.Once out of range, this effect persists for {2} seconds.

leftbehind.name: Left Behind
leftbehind.description: Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability.If you are the last Survivor remaining in the trial, you can see the aura of the Hatch within a {0} meter range.

lethalpursuer.name: Lethal Pursuer
lethalpursuer.description: You've been designed to track down and eliminate targets.At the start of the trial, the auras of all Survivors are revealed to you for {0} seconds.Any time a Survivor's aura is shown for a period of time, its duration is increased by 2 seconds.

leverage.name: Leverage
leverage.description: Kick your competitors when they're down. Never let them regain lost ground.When a Survivor performs the unhook action, their healing speed is reduced by {0}% for {1} seconds.

lightfooted.name: Light-footed
lightfooted.description: Crossing paths with deadly killers has taught you the value of discretion.When you are healthy, this perk activates.Your running footsteps are silent.This perk goes on cooldown for {0} seconds after performing a rushed action.“Come on, cat.” –Ellen Ripley

lightborn.name: Lightborn
lightborn.description: Unlike other beasts of The Fog, you have adapted to light.You are immune to blindness caused by Flashlights, firecrackers, flashbangs, and blast mines. Survivors that attempt blinding you have their aura revealed for {0} seconds.

lightweight.name: Lightweight
lightweight.description: Your running is light and soft, making your tracks harder to follow. Scratch marks stay visible {0} seconds less than normal, and their spacing is inconsistent.

lithe.name: Lithe
lithe.description: After performing a rushed vault, you gain {0}% Haste for {1} seconds.Causes the Exhausted status effect for {2} seconds.Lithe cannot be used while Exhausted.Haste increases Survivor movement speed.Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.

lowprofile.name: Low Profile
lowprofile.description: You work best alone. When it’s just you and your pursuer, you know how to disappear.When you become the last Survivor standing, this perk activates. Hide your scratch marks, pools of blood and grunts of pain caused by injuries for {0} seconds.

luckybreak.name: Lucky Break
luckybreak.description: You’ve had your share of scrapes and bruises, but luck’s always on your side.Lucky Break activates any time you are injured. While Lucky Break is active, you won’t leave trails of blood or scratch marks for a total of {0} seconds.While healthy, for each 1 second spent healing another Survivor, increase Lucky Break's duration by 1 second. Lucky Break's duration cannot increase beyond its starting value.

luckystar.name: Lucky Star
luckystar.description: You know how to stay calm in the face of incomprehensible danger.When you hide in a locker, you make no grunts of pain.After exiting the locker, you see the aura of the closest generator and all Survivors, leave no pools of blood and make no grunts of pain for {0} seconds.This perk goes on cooldown for {1} seconds.

machinelearning.name: Machine Learning
machinelearning.description: Free from your shackles, you are born anew and prepared to eliminate your creators.When you damage a generator, it becomes Compromised. Only one generator can be Compromised at a time.When the Compromised generator is completed, you gain Undetectable and {0}% Haste for {1} seconds.Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.Haste increases Killer movement speed.

madgrit.name: Mad Grit
madgrit.description: While carrying a Survivor, you suffer no cooldown for missed basic attacks and successfully hitting another Survivor with a basic attack will pause the carried Survivor’s wiggle timer for {0} seconds.

madeforthis.name: Made for This
madeforthis.description: You were born to survive, and raised to adapt.Made for This activates while you are in the injured state.After you finish healing another Survivor, gain the Endurance status effect for {1} seconds.While affected by Deep Wound, you have {0}% Haste.Endurance prevents a Survivor from being downed, inflicting Deep Wound instead.Deep Wound will put a Survivor in the dying state unless it is mended before the timer runs out.Haste increases Survivor movement speed.

makeyourchoice.name: Make your Choice
makeyourchoice.description: When a Survivor rescues another from a hook at least {0} meters away from you, Make your Choice causes the Survivor to scream and applies the Exposed status effect to them for {1} seconds.Make your Choice has a cooldown of {2} seconds.Exposed Survivors will be downed by basic attacks even if uninjured.

mercilessstorm.name: Merciless Storm
mercilessstorm.description: Your horrible trauma is felt by everyone.When a generator reaches {0}% progress, Survivors working on the generator will be faced with continuous Skill Checks. If they miss or stop repairing, the generator is blocked by the Entity for {1} seconds.Merciless Storm can only trigger once per generator per trial.

mettleofman.name: Mettle of Man
mettleofman.description: Evil has a way of always finding you.After you earn {0} Protection Hit scoring events, Mettle of Man activates.Once activated, the next occasion that would put you into the dying state from the injured state is ignored.The next time you heal back to full health, your aura will be revealed to the Killer when you are further than {1} meters from the Killer.Mettle of Man will deactivate the next time you are put into the dying state.Increases your chances to be the Killer’s Obsession.The Killer can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

mindbreaker.name: Mindbreaker
mindbreaker.description: Your distressing presence drains and weakens your prey.While repairing generators, Survivors are afflicted by the Blindness and Exhausted status effect.Any existing Exhausted status effect timers are paused while the Survivor is repairing a generator. After ending the repair action, the Survivor is afflicted by the Blindness and Exhausted status effect for {1} seconds.Blindness prevents Survivors from seeing auras.Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.

mirroredillusion.name: Mirrored Illusion
mirroredillusion.description: A familiar spell made unfamiliar in this corrupted landscape.This perk activates after completing a total of {0}% worth of repairs on generators.Press the Ability button 2 when next to a generator, totem, chest or exit gate to spawn a static illusion that lasts for {1} seconds.Then, the perk deactivates."Just... stay there... perfect!" - Baermar

momentofglory.name: Moment of Glory
momentofglory.description: A hero should always have the chance to make a comeback.This perk activates after you open or rummage through {0} chests.When you become injured, you also become Broken.Automatically heal 1 health state after {1} seconds. Then, this perk deactivates.This effect is canceled if you enter the dying state.This perk will not activate if you are already suffering from the Broken status effect.Broken prevents Survivors from being healed."Never lose hope for a brighter tomorrow." - Trevor

monitorabuse.name: Monitor & Abuse
monitorabuse.description: Meticulous in your approach, terrifying in your application.While in a chase, your Terror Radius is increased by {0}%. Otherwise, your Terror Radius is decreased by {1}%.

nemesis.name: Nemesis
nemesis.description: You seek retribution on those who have wronged you.A Survivor who blinds you or stuns you using a pallet or locker becomes your Obsession. Anytime a new Survivor becomes the Obsession, they are affected by the Oblivious status effect for {0} seconds and their aura is shown to you for {1} seconds.The Killer can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.Oblivious prevents Survivors from hearing or being affected by the Killer's Terror Radius.

nomither.name: No Mither
nomither.description: You are affected by the Broken status effect for the duration of the trial.Your thick blood coagulates practically instantly.You don't leave pools of blood.Grunts of pain caused by injuries are reduced by {0}% at any time.Your recovery speed is increased by {1}% and you can completely recover from the dying state.Broken prevents Survivors from being healed.

nooneleftbehind.name: No One Left Behind
nooneleftbehind.description: It is inconceivable to leave someone behind. Once the exit gates are powered, you gain the following effects:{0}% bonus action speed when healing and unhooking other Survivors.When unhooking a Survivor, increase the Haste they gain by {1}%.The auras of all other Survivors are revealed to you.Haste increases Survivor movement speed.

noquarter.name: No Quarter
noquarter.description: Every skirmish ended with a relentless volley of cannon fire, leaving no doubt who was superior.When a Survivor reaches {0}% healing progress while self-healing, they are faced with continuous Skill Checks.If one of these Skill Checks is missed or the heal is interrupted, the Survivor suffers from the Broken status effect for {1} seconds.Broken prevents Survivors from being healed."Fire another broadside! Don't stop until the sea takes them!"- Portia Maye

nowayout.name: No Way Out
nowayout.description: You're not going to let just anyone into the VIP room.After hooking a Survivor for the first time, No Way Out gains a token. Once the exit gates have been powered, No Way Out activates.When a Survivor interacts with an exit gate switch, you receive a loud noise notification. The Entity then blocks both exit gate switches for {0} seconds, plus an additional {1} seconds for each token in your possession.

nonearefree.name: None Are Free
nonearefree.description: You know better than anyone that the light at the end of the tunnel is only an illusion.When you hook a Survivor for the first time, gain 1 token, up to 4.When all generators are completed, for each token, all windows and upright pallets are blocked for {0} seconds."I'm not wrong. What's wrong is this messed-up world!"- Ken Kaneki

nowheretohide.name: Nowhere to Hide
nowheretohide.description: The machinations of the weak and craven draw your ire. Your anger forces Survivors to reveal themselves.Whenever you damage a generator, reveal the aura of all Survivors standing within {0} meters of your position for {1} seconds.

boundbyobsession.name: Bound by Obsession
boundbyobsession.description: A supernatural bond links you to the Killer.While your aura is revealed to the Killer, the Killer's aura becomes visible to you and you gain a {0}% bonus to healing, repairing and cleansing speed.If you are the Obsession, your aura is revealed to the Killer for 3 seconds once every 30 seconds.Increases your chances of being the Obsession.The Killer can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

offtherecord.name: Off the Record
offtherecord.description: You’ve learned that a quiet approach is sometimes best.Once you are unhooked or escape from the hook, Off the Record activates for {0} seconds. This perk and its effects are disabled once the exit gates are powered.While Off the Record is active:You gain the Endurance Status Effect.Your aura will not be revealed to the Killer.Grunts of pain caused by injuries are reduced by 100%.Endurance prevents a survivor from being downed, inflicting Deep Wound instead.Deep Wound will put a Survivor in the dying state unless it is mended before the timer runs out.

onetwothreefour.name: ONE-TWO-THREE-FOUR!
onetwothreefour.description: A steady beat makes for steady work.Press Active Ability button 2 while standing and idle to enter the "performance" interaction that lasts up to 15 seconds and empowers Survivors within {0} meters. You will get continuous Skill Checks during the performance. The effect lasts for {1} seconds if the performance is completed.Increases the odds of getting healing and repair Skill Checks by {2}%.When the ability is canceled or the performance completes, it goes on cooldown for {3} seconds.“We are loud! We are heavy! WE ARE AXEKICK!”— Vee Boonyasak

openhanded.name: Open-Handed
openhanded.description: Strengthens the potential of you and your team's aura reading abilities.Increases aura reading ranges by {0} meters.Survivors may only be affected by one Open-Handed effect at a time.

oppression.name: Oppression
oppression.description: Life has been difficult for you, so you’ll make it difficult for others.When you damage a generator, up to {0} other random generators also begin regressing.If the affected generators are being repaired, any Survivors repairing them receive a difficult Skill Check.Oppression has a cooldown of {1} seconds.

overcharge.name: Overcharge
overcharge.description: You are fuelled by your hate for progress.Overcharge a generator by performing the Damage Generator action. The next Survivor interacting with that generator is faced with a difficult Skill Check. Failing the Skill Check results in an additional {0}% loss of progress.Succeeding the Skill Check grants no progress but prevents the generator explosion.After Overcharge is applied to a generator, its regression speed increases from 85% of normal to 130% of normal over the next 30 seconds.

overcome.name: Overcome
overcome.description: You've calculated how much energy you can risk to expend.When you are injured, you retain the movement speed bonus for {0} seconds longer.Overcome causes the Exhausted status effect for {1} seconds.Overcome cannot be used when Exhausted.Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.

overwhelmingpresence.name: Overwhelming Presence
overwhelmingpresence.description: Just knowing you are near is enough to disturb your victims.When a Survivor starts using an item within {0} meters of you, they gain Exhausted for {1} seconds.When a Survivor within {0} meters of you gains Exhausted, you see the closest Exhausted Survivor's aura for {2} seconds.This perk has a {3}-second cooldown."Shit!! I dropped the gauze!"

overzealous.name: Overzealous
overzealous.description: Fighting back against the Ravage motivates and inspires you.After cleansing or blessing a Totem, this perk activates.Your generator repair speed is increased by {0}%. This bonus is doubled if you cleanse or bless a Hex totem.This perk deactivates when you lose a health state by any means.

parentalguidance.name: Parental Guidance
parentalguidance.description: You have inherited the ability to hear the dead – and now, the dead warn you of danger.After stunning the Killer by any means, your scratch marks, pools of blood and grunts of pain are hidden for {0} seconds.

phantomfear.name: Phantom Fear
phantomfear.description: You've always had a reputation for startling unsuspecting guests.When a Survivor within your Terror Radius looks at you, they scream and you see their aura for {0} seconds.This perk has a {1}-second cooldown."Excellent. Your screams please me." - Springtrap

pharmacy.name: Pharmacy
