pharmacy.description: You have a knack for finding medicine.Unlocking chests is {0}% faster.The hearing distance for noises from unlocking chests is reduced by {1} meters.Pharmacy guarantees an Emergency Med-kit upon completing the interaction.

seehowtheyrun.name: See How They Run
seehowtheyrun.description: You become obsessed with one Survivor.Every time you chase your Obsession and let them escape, you receive a token up to a maximum of {0} tokens.For each token, you have {1}% Haste.Performing a Basic Attack or Special Attack spends one token.The Killer can only be Obsessed with one Survivor at a time.Haste increases Killer movement speed.

plottwist.name: Plot Twist
plottwist.description: Big moments are vital, but you know that sometimes an understated read can be just as powerful.Plot Twist activates when you are injured.Press the ability button 2 while crouched and motionless to enter the dying state silently.When using Plot Twist to enter the dying state: you leave no blood pools and you make no noise and you can fully recover from the dying state at 25% increased speed.When you recover by yourself using Plot Twist, you are healed instantly and you gain {0}% Haste for {1} seconds.This perk deactivates if you recover by yourself by any means.This perk re-activates when the exit gates are powered.Haste increases Survivor movement speed.

plunderersinstinct.name: Plunderer's Instinct
plunderersinstinct.description: Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. Reveal unopened chests and items when within a {0} meter range. Increases the odds of finding an item of higher rarity from chests by 50%.

poised.name: Poised
poised.description: Achieving goals boosts your confidence.When first starting repairs on a generator, reveal the Killer's aura for {0} seconds. When a generator is completed, you leave no scratch marks for {1} seconds.

popgoestheweasel.name: Pop Goes the Weasel
popgoestheweasel.description: A deep bond with The Entity unlocks great strength.After hooking a Survivor, the next generator you damage instantly loses {0}% of its current progress. Normal generator regression applies after the Damage Generator action.Pop Goes the Weasel is active for {1} seconds after the Survivor is hooked.

potentialenergy.name: Potential Energy
potentialenergy.description: Your arcane abilities have adapted to The Entity's Realm after centuries of wandering, granting you unprecedented control over its many devices.While repairing, press the Active Ability Button 2 to gain tokens instead of repairing the generator, up to a maximum of {1} tokens.While you have at least 1 token, press the Active Ability Button 2 to consume all tokens and repair the generator for 1% per token spent.When you lose a health state, all tokens are lost.

powerstruggle.name: Power Struggle
powerstruggle.description: You’ve never given up and you’re not about to start now.Whenever you are in the dying state, you see the auras of available Pallets.While being carried by The Killer, reaching {0}% wiggle progress activates Power Struggle. While Power Struggle is active, you can drop a nearby, standing pallet to stun The Killer.

predator.name: Predator
predator.description: Your acute tracking ability allows you to hone in on disturbances left by running Survivors.When a Survivor escapes a chase, reveal their aura for {0} seconds. This perk has a {1}-second cooldown.

premonition.name: Premonition
premonition.description: You have the undeniable capability to sense danger. Get an auditory warning when looking in the direction of the Killer in a 45 degree cone within a range of {0} meters. Premonition has a cooldown of {1} seconds each time it activates.

provethyself.name: Prove Thyself
provethyself.description: For every other Survivor working on a generator within a {0} meter range, gain {1}% repair speed bonus. This same bonus is also applied to all other Survivors within range.Survivors can only be affected by one Prove Thyself effect at a time.

quickquiet.name: Quick & Quiet
quickquiet.description: You do not make as much noise as others when quickly vaulting over obstacles or hiding in lockers.The vault and hide actions' noise detection and audio range is reduced by {0}%.This effect can only trigger once every {1} seconds.

quickgambit.name: Quick Gambit
quickgambit.description: When you have a Killer's attention, you know how to keep it; others can be confident they won't be interrupted any time soon.When you are chased by the Killer, see the aura of other Survivors. Any Survivor repairing a generator gains a {0}% repair speed bonus.This perk goes on cooldown for {1} seconds when you lose a health state.

rancor.name: Rancor
rancor.description: You become obsessed with one Survivor.Each time a generator is completed, your Obsession sees your aura for {0} seconds.Each time a generator is completed, all Survivors' locations are revealed to you for {1} seconds.Once the exit gates are powered, the Obsession has the Exposed status effect and you can kill them.The Killer can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.Exposed Survivors will be downed by basic attacks even if uninjured.

rapidbrutality.name: Rapid Brutality
rapidbrutality.description: You move with a speed and fury that makes blood run cold.While chasing a Survivor, you cannot gain Bloodlust.Hitting a Survivor with a basic attack gives you {0}% Haste for {1} seconds.Haste increases Killer movement speed.“Catch it, put it in the airlock, get rid of it.” –Dallas

rapidresponse.name: Rapid Response
rapidresponse.description: When the moment comes, you give it your all. Your survival depends on it.When you do a Fast Locker Exit, you suffer from the Exhausted status effect for {0} seconds.When you gain Exhausted, you see the Killer's aura for {1} seconds.Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating other perks that cause Exhausted."All right. You got this. 3... 2... 1... go!" - Orela Rose

ravenous.name: Ravenous
ravenous.description: The scent of blood is in the air. Time to feast.Whenever you hook a Survivor for the first time, gain 1 token, up to a maximum of 4.When you have 4 tokens, all Survivors scream and are inflicted with Exposed for {0} seconds.Exposed Survivors are downed by basic attacks, even if uninjured.“Weeping Ginevra’s blood streams/The devil smells the weak.” —Fabbro Barone’s “Ginevra”

reactivehealing.name: Reactive Healing
reactivehealing.description: The more the situation becomes compromised, the more determined you become to complete the operation.When another Survivor loses a health state in a {1}-meter radius around you while you are injured, instantly increase your healing progression by {0}% of the missing healing progression.

reassurance.name: Reassurance
reassurance.description: Your presence helps allies focus, assuaging the panic associated with extreme conditions.When within a {2}-meter radius around a hooked Survivor, use the Active Ability Button 2 to pause their struggle progression for {0} seconds.If they are on the struggle phase, it also pauses the Struggle Skill Checks.Reassurance can only be triggered once per survivor per hook instance.

redherring.name: Red Herring
redherring.description: You’ve noticed that people pay attention to whatever makes the loudest noise.After repairing a generator for at least {0} seconds, it will be highlighted to you with a yellow aura. The generator stays highlighted until it is fully repaired, you repair a new generator, or enter a locker.Entering any locker will trigger a loud noise indicator for The Killer at the highlighted generator's location.Red Herring can only be triggered once every {1} seconds.

rememberme.name: Remember Me
rememberme.description: When The Obsession takes damage, gain 1 token, up to {0}.Other Survivors open exit gates {1}% slower for each token.

repressedalliance.name: Repressed Alliance
repressedalliance.description: You’re accustomed to being hunted by malicious forces, and you’ve begun using it to your advantage.Repressed Alliance activates after repairing generators for a total of {0} seconds.When repairing a generator while the perk is active, press the Active Ability Button 1 to call upon The Entity to block the generator for {1} seconds. The perk deactivates.This interaction is not available if other Survivors are repairing the generator.Affected generators will be revealed by a white aura to all Survivors.

residualmanifest.name: Residual Manifest
residualmanifest.description: A lifetime of chasing the darkness has taught you that the best disinfectant is light.After a successful Killer Blind action, the Killer is affected by the Blindness status effect for {0} seconds.This perk grants the ability to rummage through an opened chest once per trial and will guarantee a basic Flashlight.Blindness prevents the Killer from seeing auras.

resilience.name: Resilience
resilience.description: You are motivated in dire situations. Grants {0}% additional speed when repairing, sabotaging, healing, unhooking, vaulting, cleansing or blessing a Totem, opening exit gates, and unlocking while injured.

resurgence.name: Resurgence
resurgence.description: You've come back from near impossible odds... and you'll do it again.Gain {0}% healing progress instantly after being unhooked or unhooking yourself.

roadlife.name: Road Life
roadlife.description: Faulty amps, sweaty dives, broken-down vans… nothing makes you feel more alive.While injured, not Broken and repairing a generator, gain 1 token for each regular great Skill Check success.When you have {0} tokens, spend all tokens and gain {1}% healing speed until you stop healing.Lose {2} token when you fail a regular Skill Check.Broken prevents Survivors from being healed.“Remind me to teach you how to patch your own pedals, Krit.” — Vee Boonyasak

rookiespirit.name: Rookie Spirit
rookiespirit.description: You keep a careful eye on objectives when they're slipping away.Complete {0} good or great Skill Checks while repairing generators to activate Rookie Spirit for the remainder of the trial.Once active, you can see the aura of regressing generators.

saboteur.name: Saboteur
saboteur.description: Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability.See hook auras in a 56 meter radius from the pickup spot if another Survivor is being carried. Scourge Hooks are shown in yellow.Unlocks the ability to sabotage hooks without a Toolbox.Sabotaging a hook without a Toolbox takes 2.3 seconds.The sabotage action has a {0} second cooldown.

keepthemwaiting.name: Keep Them Waiting
keepthemwaiting.description: You become obsessed with one Survivor.Earn a token for each successful basic attack that is not dealt to the Obsession. Each token grants a stackable {0}% decreased successful basic attack cooldown, you can earn up to {1} tokens.When you hit the Obsession with a Basic Attack or Special Attack, lose {2} tokens. You cannot gain tokens as long as your Obsession is sacrificed or killed.The Killer can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

scavenger.name: Scavenger
scavenger.description: Where others see junk, you see valuable improvised tools.While you are holding an empty toolbox, Scavenger activates.Succeeding a great skill check while repairing gains {0} token, up to {1}.When you reach maximum tokens, lose all tokens and automatically recharge your toolbox to full. Then, your generator repair speed is {2}% slower for {3} seconds.This perk grants the ability to rummage through an opened chest once per Trial and will guarantee a basic Toolbox.

scenepartner.name: Scene Partner
scenepartner.description: You lock in with your co-star, engaging with and reacting to each other on a higher level.Scene Partner activates when you are in the Killer's Terror Radius.Whenever you look at the Killer, scream, then see the Killer's aura for {0} seconds.There is a chance you will scream again, if you do, you will see the Killer's aura for an additional 2 seconds.Scene Partner then goes on cooldown for {1} seconds.

scourgehookfloodsofrage.name: Scourge Hook: Floods of Rage
scourgehookfloodsofrage.description: You form a psychic connection with The Entity and alter the rules of the trial.At the start of the trial, {0} random hooks are changed into scourge hooks. You see their auras in white.When a Survivor is unhooked from a scourge hook, all other Survivors have their auras revealed for {1} seconds.

scourgehookweepingowounds.name: Scourge Hook: Weeping Wounds
scourgehookweepingowounds.description: You are the bringer of sweet pain.At the start of the trial, {0} random hooks are changed into scourge hooks. You see their auras in white.When a Survivor is unhooked from a scourge hook, they suffer from the Hemorrhage and Mangled status effect for {1} seconds. The first time the Survivor is healed, they suffer a {2}% speed penalty to healing and repairing actions until injured again.Hemorrhage regresses healing progress when not healing, and increases blood trails left by injured survivors. This lasts for a set duration or until fully healed.Mangled increases time required to heal by 25% and lasts for a set duration or until fully healed.

scourgehookhangmanstrick.name: Scourge Hook: Hangman's Trick
scourgehookhangmanstrick.description: Your ingenious modifications to hooks alert you of tampering.At the start of the trial, 4 random hooks are changed into scourge hooks. You see their auras in white.Gain a notification when a Survivor begins sabotaging a hook.While carrying a Survivor, see the aura of any Survivor within {0} meters of a scourge hook.

scourgehookjaggedcompass.name: Scourge Hook: Jagged Compass
scourgehookjaggedcompass.description: Sometimes the compass points north. Other times it points somewhere else entirely.At the start of the trial, up to 4 random hooks are changed into scourge hooks. You see their auras in white.When a Survivor is unhooked from a hook, it becomes a scourge hook.When you hook a Survivor on a scourge hook, the aura of the generator with the most progress is revealed in yellow for {0} seconds."Drop anchor! I will chart us a new course." - Portia Maye

scourgehookmonstrousshrine.name: Scourge Hook: Monstrous Shrine
scourgehookmonstrousshrine.description: Your fervent care of the hooks found in the basement have aroused The Entity's interest.At the start of the trial, {0} random hooks are changed into scourge hooks. You see their auras in white.Scourge Hooks grant {1}% faster Entity progression if the Killer is not within 24 meters.Basement hooks count as Scourge Hooks.

scourgehookpainresonance.name: Scourge Hook: Pain Resonance
scourgehookpainresonance.description: Overwhelming pain reverberates outwards into chaos.At the start of the trial, {0} random hooks are changed into scourge hooks. You see their auras in white.You start the Trial with 4 tokens, 1 for each Survivor. If a generator is available when that Survivor is hooked on a scourge hook, lose 1 token. The generator with the most progress explodes, instantly losing {1}% progress, and will start to regress. Survivors repairing the generator will scream.Once you have no tokens, Pain Resonance deactivates for the rest of the Trial.

secondwind.name: Second Wind
secondwind.description: When you have healed other Survivors for the equivalent of one health state, Second Wind activates. If you are already afflicted by the Broken status effect, Second Wind does not activate.While Second Wind is activated, the next time you are unhooked or you unhook yourself, you are affected by the Broken status effect. After a total duration of {0} seconds, Second Wind automatically heals you from injured to healthy.Second Wind deactivates once you become healthy or if you are put into the dying state before Second Wind successfully triggers. You lose the Broken status effect.Broken prevents Survivors from being healed.

secretproject.name: Secret Project
secretproject.description: Raised to be a weapon, you broke free with the very skills your captors honed within you.When a totem is blessed or cleansed, block a random unblocked generator for {0} seconds.When 1 or more generators become blocked, you gain Undetectable for {1} seconds.Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.“You are a prisoner here, just like me.” —Henry Creel

selfcare.name: Self-Care
selfcare.description: Unlocks the Self Care ability, which allows you to heal without a Med-kit at {0}% normal healing speed.

selfpreservation.name: Self-Preservation
selfpreservation.description: Life's unforgiving. Sometimes it's best to look out for yourself.Whenever another Survivor within {0} meters of you gets hit by a basic attack or a special attack, Self-Preservation activates.Your scratch marks, pools of blood and grunts of pain are hidden for {1} seconds.

septictouch.name: Septic Touch
septictouch.description: The Land of Shadows subsumes all. Healing only delays the inevitable.Whenever a Survivor performs the healing action within your Terror Radius, that Survivor suffers from Blindness and Exhausted.These effects linger for {0} seconds after a healing action is interrupted by any means.Blindness prevents Survivors from seeing auras.Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.

shadowborn.name: Shadowborn
shadowborn.description: You have a keen vision in the darkness of the night.When blinded by any means, gain {0}% Haste for {1} seconds.Haste increases Killer movement speed.

shatteredhope.name: Shattered Hope
shatteredhope.description: To capture your prey, you must first extinguish their hope.Whenever you snuff a Boon Totem, the totem is destroyed instead.When you destroy a Boon Totem this way, the auras of all Survivors inside the Boon Totem range are revealed to you for {0} seconds.

shouldertheburden.name: Shoulder the Burden
shouldertheburden.description: Born to be a disciple. Ready to submit to a greater cause. This is your calling.Once per trial, as long as you are not on death hook, press the Ability button 2 in front of a hooked Survivor to unhook them.When they are unhooked, they lose 1 hook state and you gain 1 hook state. You also scream and gain the Exposed status effect for {0} seconds.Exposed Survivors will be downed by basic attacks even if uninjured."It's not your time yet. Now go on!" - Taurie Cain

slipperymeat.name: Slippery Meat
slipperymeat.description: You have developed an efficient way to get off hooks.Unlocks the ability to attempt to unhook yourself.Grants up to {0} extra escape attempts on the hook.Hook escape attempts have a {1}% increased chance to succeed.

sloppybutcher.name: Sloppy Butcher
sloppybutcher.description: You know where to hit to make them bleed.Wounds inflicted by basic attacks cause Survivors to suffer from the Hemorrhage and Mangled status effects for {0} seconds.Increases the rate at which healing progression is lost from Hemorrhage by {1}%.Hemorrhage regresses healing progress when not healing, and increases blood trails left by injured survivors. This lasts for a set duration or until fully healed.Mangled increases time required to heal by 25% and lasts for a set duration or until fully healed.

smallgame.name: Small Game
smallgame.description: You have the undeniable capability to sense danger. Get an auditory warning when looking in the direction of Totems in a 45-degree cone within a range of {0} meters. Small Game has a cooldown of {1} seconds each time it activates. For each Dull Totem and Hex Totem cleansed by any player, gain a Token. Small Game's detection cone is reduced by 5 degrees per token.

smashhit.name: Smash Hit
smashhit.description: When your rival makes a mistake, you seize the opportunity.After stunning the Killer with a pallet, gain {0}% Haste for {1} seconds.Causes the Exhausted status effect for {2} seconds.This perk cannot be used while Exhausted.Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.Haste increases Survivor movement speed.

downtothelast.name: Down to the Last
downtothelast.description: As more of your friends fall to the Killer, you become shrouded in isolation and the Killer's aura-reading abilities towards you are disrupted.Every time a fellow Survivor is killed or sacrificed, gain a token. For each token, your aura cannot be read by The Killer within a max range of {0} meters.When you're the last Survivor alive:Gain 75% action speed when repairing generators.Gain 50% action speed while opening an exit gate or the Hatch.Increases your chances of being The Killer's Obsession.The Killer can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

solidarity.name: Solidarity
solidarity.description: Sharing painful experiences has the power to heal.While injured, healing a Survivor without using a Med-kit also heals you at a {0}% conversion rate.

soulguard.name: Soul Guard
soulguard.description: You have been through immense hardship and you’re stronger for it.Gain the Endurance status effect for {0} seconds after being healed or having recovered from the dying state.While cursed by a Hex, you can fully recover from the dying state.This effect can only trigger once every 30 seconds.Endurance prevents a Survivor from being downed, inflicting Deep Wound instead.Deep Wound will put a Survivor in the dying state unless it is mended before the timer runs out.

specialist.name: Specialist
specialist.description: Adventure. Exploration. Excavation. You are in your element.Each time you open or rummage through a chest, gain 1 token, up to {0}.When you perform a great Skill Check on a generator, consume all tokens. Then, for each token consumed, reduce the maximum required generator progress by {1}."Well, then. Doesn't this feel familiar?" - Lara Croft

spiesfromtheshadows.name: Spies from the Shadows
spiesfromtheshadows.description: The crows found in the world can communicate with you directly.{0}% of the time, cawing crows give you a visual cue when you are within a {1} meter range.Spies From The Shadows has a cooldown of {2} seconds.

spinechill.name: Spine Chill
spinechill.description: An unnatural tingle warns you of impending doom.Get notified when the Killer is looking at you with a clear line of sight within a 36-meter range. Your speed while repairing, sabotaging, healing, unhooking, cleansing, blessing, opening exit gates and unlocking is increased by {0}%.The effects of Spine Chill linger for 0.5 seconds after the Killer looks away or is out of range.

spiritfury.name: Spirit Fury
spiritfury.description: Each pallet you break magnifies the wrath of The Entity.After you break {0} pallets, the next time you are stunned by a pallet, The Entity will instantly break the pallet.You still suffer from the stun effect penalty.

sprintburst.name: Sprint Burst
sprintburst.description: When you start running, gain {0}% Haste for a maximum of {1} seconds.Causes the Exhausted status effect for {2} seconds.Sprint Burst cannot be used while Exhausted.You do not recover from the Exhausted status effect while running.Haste increases Survivor movement speed.Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.

stakeout.name: Stake Out
stakeout.description: Getting close to the Killer fills you with determination. For each {0} seconds you are standing within the Killer Terror Radius and not in a chase, you gain a token up to a maximum of {1} tokens.When Stake Out has at least 1 token, good Skill Checks are considered great Skill Checks, consume 1 token, and grant an additional 1% bonus to generator repair progress.

starstruck.name: Starstruck
starstruck.description: Your unmatched showmanship dazzles all.While carrying a Survivor, any other Survivors within your Terror Radius suffer from the Exposed status effect.The effect persists for {0} seconds on Survivors who leave your Terror Radius, as well as those within the radius when you hook or release the carried Survivor.Starstruck has a cooldown of {1} seconds once a Survivor is no longer carried.Exposed Survivors will be downed by basic attacks even if uninjured.

stillsight.name: Still Sight
stillsight.description: A clear mind and calm temperament will always find the means of their escape.After not moving for {0} seconds, this perk activates.Until you start moving, you see the aura of the Killer as well as all generators and chests within {1} meters."Breathe in. Breathe out. Now open your eyes." - Baermar

streetwise.name: Streetwise
streetwise.description: Long nights out taught you to do a lot with what you've got.The first time you deplete an Item with charges, see the Killer's Aura for {1} seconds.Items with charges retrieved from Chests have +{0}% charges."You're doing it wrong! Let me show you how it's done." - Nea

strengthinshadows.name: Strength in Shadows
strengthinshadows.description: A chance for renewed power down where danger calls home.When in the basement, this perk activates.Unlocks the Strength in Shadows ability, which allows you to heal without a Med-kit at {0}% normal healing speed.When you finish a heal in the basement, you see the Killer's aura for {1} seconds."I’m getting out of here, if it’s the last thing I do.” - Sable

stridor.name: Stridor
stridor.description: You are acutely sensitive to the breathing of your prey.Breathing of Survivors in pain is {0}% louder and regular breathing is {1}% louder.

superioranatomy.name: Superior Anatomy
superioranatomy.description: Decades of research have culminated in you: something faster, stronger, and more dangerous than any human.When a Survivor performs a fast vault within {1} meters of you, this perk activates. The next time you vault a window, your vaulting speed is increased by {0}%.This perk deactivates after vaulting a window.This perk has a {2} second cooldown.

surge.name: Surge
surge.description: Your eerie presence charges the air and interferes with technology.Putting a Survivor into the dying state with a basic attack causes all generators within a 32-meter radius to explode instantly and begin regressing. Survivors repairing the generator will scream. Generators affected by Surge immediately lose {0}% of their progress.

surveillance.name: Surveillance
surveillance.description: Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. Any regressing generator will be highlighted by a white aura. If the regression is interrupted on a generator, it will be highlighted by a yellow aura for {0} seconds.Noises created by generator repairs are audible at an additional {1} meters.

teamworkcollectivestealth.name: Teamwork: Collective Stealth
teamworkcollectivestealth.description: When someone helps you out, you respond in kind.When another Survivor finishes healing you, you both leave no scratch marks as long as you stay within {1} meters of each other.This effect lingers for 4 seconds when leaving the range.This effect does not stack.

teamworkfullcircuit.name: Teamwork: Full Circuit
teamworkfullcircuit.description: You’ve dabbled with mechanical engineering and show off your abilities to others.For each Survivor repairing a generator with you, the size of the good Skill Check zone is increased by {0}%.While repairing with at least 1 other Survivor, you repair {1}% faster.“How many times do I have to be right on the money before you guys just trust me?” —Dustin Henderson

teamworkpoweroftwo.name: Teamwork: Power of Two
teamworkpoweroftwo.description: It’s hard to keep up with you, but it doesn’t stop people from trying.When you finish healing another Survivor, you both gain {0}% Haste as long as you stay within {1} meters of each other.This effect lingers for 4 seconds when leaving the range.This effect does not stack.Haste increases Survivor movement speed.

teamworksoftspoken.name: Teamwork: Soft-Spoken
teamworksoftspoken.description: You look out for your friends, using your abilities to protect them.For each Survivor repairing a generator with you, the range at which the generator’s noise is heard is reduced by {0}%.While repairing with at least 1 other Survivor, you repair {1}% faster."I make my own rules." —Eleven

teamworkthrowdown.name: Teamwork: Throw Down
teamworkthrowdown.description: You know the best way to even the odds is to empower those around you.When you pallet-stun or blind the Killer, other injured Survivors within {0} meters gain Endurance and see the Killer's aura for {1} seconds.Endurance prevents a Survivor from being downed, inflicting Deep Wound instead.Deep Wound will put a Survivor in the dying state unless it is mended before the timer runs out."Facing evil brings good people together." - Michonne Grimes

teamworktoughenup.name: Teamwork: Toughen Up
teamworktoughenup.description: You maintain your composure under immense amounts of pain.When another Survivor pallet-stuns or blinds the Killer while you are injured and within {0} meters, your grunts of pain, scratch marks, and pools of blood are reduced by {1}% for {2} seconds.“They're fucking with the wrong people.” —Rick Grimes

technician.name: Technician
technician.description: You are apt at handling machinery with the greatest care and precision.The noises caused by your repairs and their hearing distance are reduced by {0} meters.On a failed repair Skill Check, the following effects happen:The generator explosion will be prevented.The generator loses progress as usual.An additional {1}% progress is lost.

tenacity.name: Tenacity
tenacity.description: There is nothing stopping you.Your ferocious tenacity in dire situations allows you to, while in the dying state, have {0}% Haste and gain recovery progress while crawling. While you are in the dying state, your aura cannot be read by the Killer and Grunts of pain are reduced by 75%.Haste increases Survivor movement speed.

terminus.name: Terminus
terminus.description: You are a brilliant tactician who prepares for every eventuality.When exit gates are powered, this perk activates. While Terminus is active, injured, downed and hooked Survivors are inflicted with the Broken status effect until exit gates are open.When exit gates are open, Survivors will stay Broken for an additional {0} seconds.Broken prevents Survivors from being healed.

territorialimperative.name: Territorial Imperative
territorialimperative.description: Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. Survivors' auras are revealed to you for {0} seconds when they enter the basement and you are more than {1} meters away from the basement entrance.Territorial Imperative can only be triggered once every {2} seconds.

thanatophobia.name: Thanatophobia
thanatophobia.description: Their courage fades in the face of undeniable mortality.For each injured, dying, or hooked Survivor, all Survivors receive a penalty of {0}% to repair, sabotage and Totem-cleansing speeds.If there are 4 injured, dying or hooked Survivors, there is an additional 12% penalty to repair, sabotage and Totem-cleansing speeds.

thisisnothappening.name: This Is Not Happening
thisisnothappening.description: You perform at your best when you are under extreme stress. Great Skill Check success zones when repairing and healing get {0}% bigger when you are injured.

thrillingtremors.name: Thrilling Tremors
thrillingtremors.description: Your dark designs and shrewd composure rouse The Entity.After picking up a Survivor, all Generators not being repaired by Survivors are blocked by The Entity and cannot be repaired for the next {0} seconds. Affected generators are highlighted by a white aura.Thrilling Tremors can only be triggered once every {1} seconds.

thwack.name: THWACK!
thwack.description: Your prey is terrified by your relentless pursuit.THWACK! starts with {0} tokens.When breaking a pallet or breakable wall, consume a token.Survivors within {1} meters scream, and their auras are revealed for {2} seconds.When hooking a Survivor, regain {3} token.

tinkerer.name: Tinkerer
tinkerer.description: Whenever a generator is repaired to {0}% progress, it triggers a loud noise notification and you are granted the Undetectable status effect for the next {2} seconds. This effect can only be triggered once on each generator.Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

trailoftorment.name: Trail of Torment
trailoftorment.description: You guide your victims along a path of pain and punishment.After damaging a generator, you become Undetectable until the generator stops regressing. During this time, the generator’s yellow aura is revealed to Survivors.This effect can only trigger once every {2} seconds.Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

troubleshooter.name: Troubleshooter
troubleshooter.description: No amount of distraction will shake you from your primary task.When you are chased by the Killer, Troubleshooter activates.You see the aura of the Generator with the most progress.You see the aura of the Killer for {0} seconds after dropping a Pallet.The effect lasts for {1} seconds after being in chase, then deactivates.

turnbacktheclock.name: Turn Back The Clock
turnbacktheclock.description: Resist as they might, time marches on, and your master plan comes closer to fruition.After hooking a Survivor, for {0} seconds, press the Ability button 1 to make a target generator you can see within {1} meters explode, lose {2}% progress and start regressing.“Nothing will happen to you... Nothing that you don’t deserve!” —Henry Creel

ultimateweapon.name: Ultimate Weapon
ultimateweapon.description: When they spot you, they know the end is near.When you open a locker, all Survivors within {0} meters of the locker scream and reveal their position, then gain Blindness for {1} seconds.This perk goes on cooldown for {2} seconds.Blindness prevents Survivors from seeing auras.“I can't lie to you about your chances, but... you have my sympathies.” –Ash

unbound.name: Unbound
unbound.description: Pain lingers in the air, an alluring aroma that excites the impulses.This perk activates for {0} seconds after a Survivor becomes injured by any means.After vaulting a window, you gain {1}% Haste for {2} seconds.Haste increases Killer movement speed."I heard it. Running. It was getting closer!” - Anonymous Testimony, 09/09/1979

unbreakable.name: Unbreakable
unbreakable.description: Past battles have taught you a thing or two about survival.Grants the ability to fully recover from the dying state once per trial. Increases dying recovery speed by {0}%.

undone.name: Undone
undone.description: Hope is the delusion that keeps its victims alive.When a Survivor misses a healing or repair Skill Check, gain 3 tokens, up to {0}.When you perform the damage action on a generator, if you have any tokens, consume all of them. For each token consumed, the generator loses {1}% total progress and then becomes blocked for {2} second. Then, once the generator is unblocked, it starts regressing.This perk goes on cooldown for {3} seconds."Erratic behavior in machinery could be related to [REDACTED], further testing required.” - OSS Report, 12/02/1943

unforeseen.name: Unforeseen
unforeseen.description: Terror takes many forms and whispers devastating lies in its victims’ ears.When you perform the damage action on a generator, your Terror Radius transfers to the generator for {0} seconds and its radius is set to {1} meters.You gain Undetectable for that duration.Then, this perk goes on cooldown for {2} seconds.Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain."Mom, if you find this, I’m sorry...” - Final Journal Entry, 07/12/1991

unnervingpresence.name: Unnerving Presence
unnervingpresence.description: Your presence alone instills great fear.Survivors within your Terror Radius have a {0}% greater chance of triggering Skill Checks when repairing or healing. Triggered Skill Checks' success zones are reduced by {1}%.

unrelenting.name: Unrelenting
unrelenting.description: You recuperate faster from missed attacks made with your main weapon. The cooldown after missed basic attacks is reduced by {0}%.

uptheante.name: Up the Ante
uptheante.description: All will be well in the end; you just know it. Your confidence strengthens the feeling of hope for those around you.For each other Survivor still alive, grant a {0}% bonus of luck to all remaining Survivors.Unlocks the ability to attempt to unhook yourself for all Survivors.

urbanevasion.name: Urban Evasion
urbanevasion.description: Years of evading the cops taught you a thing or two about stealth.While crouching, you have {0}% Haste.Haste increases Survivor movement speed.

vigil.name: Vigil
vigil.description: You look over your friends even in dire situations.You and Survivors within {0} meters recover {1}% faster from the Blindness, Broken, Exhausted, Exposed, Hemorrhage, Hindered, Mangled and Oblivious status effects.Survivors can only be affected by one Vigil's effect at a time.Once out of range, this effect persists for {2} seconds.

visionary.name: Visionary
visionary.description: You’re remarkably focused on your means of escape.You see generator’s auras within {0} meters.Anytime a generator is completed, Visionary is disabled for {1} seconds.

wakeup.name: Wake Up!
wakeup.description: Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. Once all generators are powered, exit gates are revealed to you. While opening the exit gates, reveal your aura to other Survivors.While this perk is active, open the exit gates {0}% faster for each Survivor still alive.

wanderingeye.name: Wandering Eye
wanderingeye.description: Bloodied prey surrounds you, vying for your attention.Whenever you start chasing a Survivor, reveal the auras of all other injured Survivors within {0} meters for {1} seconds.This perk has a {2}-second cooldown.“A drop does not satiate/when a river is needed.”—Elliot Campbell’s “Grandeur of Samuel”

weseeyou.name: We See You
weseeyou.description: You’ve honed your powers and can turn the table on those who try to find you.Gain 1 token when the Killer reveals your aura.When you have {0} tokens, they are all consumed, and the Killer’s aura is revealed to you and all other Survivors for {1} seconds.This perk has a {2}-second cooldown.“It is not me. It is you. You are the monster.” —Eleven

wellmakeit.name: We'll make it
wellmakeit.description: Helping others heightens your morale.When you rescue a Survivor from a hook, gain a {0}% speed increase while healing others for {1} seconds.

weregonnaliveforever.name: We're Gonna Live Forever
weregonnaliveforever.description: Your few friends deserve the best protection.When healing another Survivor in the dying state, your healing speed is increased by {0}%.Once healing is complete, the healed Survivor gains the Endurance status effect for {1} seconds. This effect has a {2}-second cooldown.Endurance prevents a Survivor from being downed, inflicting Deep Wound instead.Deep Wound will put a Survivor in the dying state unless it is mended before the timer runs out.

weaveattunement.name: Weave Attunement
weaveattunement.description: You are so attuned to magical energies that you can sense even minor ripples around enchantments.When an item becomes depleted for the first time, it is dropped. You see the auras of dropped items.Survivors within {0} meters of dropped items have their auras revealed to you. Affected Survivors see the item's aura.When a Survivor picks up a Survivor item, they suffer from the Oblivious status effect for {1} seconds.Oblivious prevents Survivors from hearing or being affected by the Killer's Terror Radius.“No number of novelties will protect you from me!” - Vecna

whispers.name: Whispers
whispers.description: You have a rudimentary understanding of The Entity's voice.Sporadically hear The Entity's whisper when standing within a {0} meter range of a Survivor.

wicked.name: Wicked
wicked.description: They can try to hurt you. But you’re not going down so easily.Your self-unhook attempts in the basement always succeed.When you are unhooked or unhook yourself, you see the Killer's aura for {0} seconds.“I haven’t let anyone get in my way before. You think I’m gonna start now?” - Sable

windowsofopportunity.name: Windows of Opportunity
windowsofopportunity.description: Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. Auras of pallets, breakable walls, and vault locations are revealed to you when within a {0} meter range.

wiretap.name: Wiretap
wiretap.description: You know that the best way to stay one step ahead is to keep tabs on the competition.Wiretap activates after completing a total of {1}% worth of repair progress on generators.When standing next to a generator, press the Active Ability button 2 to install a Wiretap, which stays active for {0} seconds.Affected generators will be revealed to all Survivors by a yellow aura. Only one Wiretap can be active on a generator.When the Killer enters within {3} meters of the generator, their aura is revealed to all Survivors.Wiretap deactivates when the generator is damaged by the Killer or when the timer expires.

zanshintactics.name: Zanshin Tactics
zanshintactics.description: You are mentally alert and aware of nearby enemies in retreat.Reveal the aura of pallets and vaults within {0} meters. Survivors who drop pallets are revealed to you for {1} seconds.
